post.text:
VIDEO | Mumbai, Maharashtra: After two decades, the estranged Thackeray cousins -- Uddhav and Raj -- share public stage as they jointly hold a "mega victory gathering" to celebrate the Maharashtra government's roll back of the three-language policy in primary schools.

#MaharashtraPolitics 

(Full video available on PTI Videos - 
ptivideos.com)

Time travels strangely in politics — enemies become allies, and old wounds are forgotten when survival is at stake. No one is truly permanent in their stance; it’s all about convenience, opportunity, and staying relevant. The Thackeray reunion says it all.
